# This program will allow users to copy a file from one location to another

import shutil

# Ask user for source and destination file paths
src_file_path = input("Please enter the source file path: ")
dest_file_path = input("Please enter the destination file path: ")

# Copy the file from source to destination
shutil.copy(src_file_path, dest_file_path)

# Print confirmation message
print("File successfully copied from {} to {}".format(src_file_path, dest_file_path))
